# Matin's Portfolio - Next.js Project

## Project Overview
Portfolio website built with Next.js 14+, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Design System
- Max-width: 1440px with 20px padding
- Background: #fff
- Text color: #0A0A0A
- Border: 1px #0A0A0A
- Font: Manrope
- Icons: Remixicon

## Pages
- Works (homepage)
- Lab
- Service
- About
